name: Yoga on Water or YOW
description:
We have developed a unique program that combines Yoga and Paddleboarding. The stability of the Paddleboard will give you the opportunity to enjoy the yoga practice in a new and serene environment. The board is essentially your floating mat. Please come to class hydrated and with water friendly clothing. Class will last for 60 mintues. 

Never paddleboarded before?  No worries!  Paddleboard Instruction will be given before each class!  

YOW Classes take place on the Winter Park Chain of Lakes and The Butler Chain of Lakes!

"Fun, relaxing and energizing. I would highly recommend it." -Ed Meiner

name: New Smyrna Beach Mangrove Maze
description:
Join Paddleboard Orlando on a New Smyrna Beach intra-coastal adventure. The trip will commence from JB's Fish Camp.

We will be cruising through the mangroves in search of Dolphin and Manatee. There is a good chance we will encounter both and much more!

This area is home to more than 250 species of birds and land animals, the salt marshes, mangroves, lagoons and river estuaries provide feeding grounds for a fascinating variety of creatures. Plant enthusiasts can locate more than 700 species of native coastal vegetation. This area also serves as a refuge for endangered and protected species of Florida wildlife. Even Florida panthers are occasionally spotted.

If you have your own board you are welcome to join our tour for $10.00.

This will be a 2 hour tour so come hydrated, with sunblock, sunglasses/hat, water, and water shoes are encouraged.

We have 100% Customer Satisfaction; let us show you why!

Florida Resident Discount (Must show ID)
$35.00 Per Person

name: Polynesian Private Parties/Birthday Parties
description:
Our themed parties are always a hit!  Tiki tourches and Leis fill the beach along with boards and tropical clothing.  Bring the Aloha of Hawaii and the Polynesian Islands to your private party.

Not one for themed parties, no worries!  However, water friendly clothing is still suggested ;).

We meet you at your waterfront location or you can come to our PBO beach on the Winter Park Chain of lakes.  Two instructors are on hand to teach all the basics of paddleboarding and water safety.  

We have boards from 9-14ft to suit 50lbs-350lbs; everyone can learn to paddleboard, we guarantee it!

We have 100% Costumer Satisfaction; let us show you why!

Rates:
5 Boards, 2 1/2 Hours, 1 Instructor, Location of Your Choice: $200
10 Boards, 2 1/2 Hours, 2 Instructors, Location of Your Choice: $400
15 Boards, 3 Hours, 2 Instructors, Location of Your Choice: $550
20 Boards, 3 Hours, 3 Instructors, Location of Your Choice: $700
25 Boards, 4 Hours, 3 Instructors, Location of Your Choice: $900

name: Corporate "Board" Meeting
description:
Break out of the box for your Corporate Team Building.  What is better than getting everyone out of the office and onto the water.  This package includes full instruction for every participant on standing up, board positioning, paddling stroke, turning, and controlling board direction.  We have boards to suit 100lbs-325lbs; everyone in your office can paddleboard, we guarantee it!

Our introductory "Board Meeting" last for two and a half hours and two instructors are included.  You are welcome to choose one of our 5 locations: Winter Park Chain, Conway Chain, Butler Chain, New Smyrna Beach, and Cocoa.  Or choose your own waterfront and we will come to you!

We have worked with the Orlando Magic, Harris Corporation, Rollins College, Winter Park Health Foundation, and City Chase USA.

We have 100% customer satisfaction, let us show you why!

Rates:

10 Boards, 2 1/2 Hours, 2 Instructors, Location of Your Choice: $400
15 Boards, 2 1/2 Hours, 2 Instructors, Location of Your Choice: $550
20 Boards, 3 Hours, 3 Instructors, Location of Your Choice: $700
25 Boards, 4 Hours, 3 Instructors, Location of Your Choice: $900

Feel free to call us at 407-782-5080 or email for more details: adventures@paddleboardorlando.com

name: Beginner's and Group Lessons
description:
Learn the fundamentals of Stand Up Paddleboarding with Orlando's favorite team!  We will show you how to Stand Up, Proper Paddling Positioning, Efficient Stroke techniques, Turning, and Controlling Board Direction.

You will enjoy the beautiful and history rich Winter Park Chain of Lakes.  This six lake chain features "Venetian" canals and abundant wildlife.  Bald Eagles, Osprey, Anhingas, Peacocks, Otters fill the air and water while majestic water Cyprus and live oaks line the shores.   

We are also happy to offer equipment recommendations for everyone of our guests!

Rates:

1-3 $60 Per Person
4-6 $45 Per Person
7-12 $35 Per Person
13-25 $30 Per Person

*Florida Resident Discount (must show Florida I.D.)
1-3 $50 Per Person
4-6 $35 Per Person
7-12 $30 Per Person
13-25 $25 Per Person
